quest.name: Dream Big
journal:
 Quest Sync
Shaggles is searching for a solution.

Shaggles is despondent as he finds himself unable to come up with a suitable plan to rid the Archeion of its woodworm infestation. N'welhi Tia suggests you try to /pet the young troll to see if you can lift his spirits.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
You tenderly pet Shaggles, but he doesn't seem especially happy about it. Perhaps he'll appreciate your intentions if you /pet him once more.
Shaggles starts to feel more like himself after a good petting. With further discussion, he decides that attempting to suffocate the woodworms is the best course of action.

Shaggles's plan will require limestone and acid to create a smothering gas, and you helpfully procure the former from the thirty-third facet for him. As the acid was N'welhi Tia's troll-assigned problem, you need only meet him and Shaggles back at the Archeion.

The testing phase of the plan goes smashingly well and, as promised, Shaggles is freed from his former specimen status and made an apprentice researcher. Delighted by his success, he resolves to do all he can to find a way to converse with those who do not possess the Echo.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr...

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm so sorry you got dragged into this. It's all my fault for acting so rashly.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr... I worry that I won't be able to come up with a way to solve our problem...

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Let me grrr and think on my own for a bit.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: It's all right. You don't need to interpret for me. Even I can tell he's struggling with the weight of this task.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: You know, creatures like trolls tend to perk up when someone pets them. Why don't you show Shaggles some affection?

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: He might pretend not to like it at first, but trust me─he'll warm up to it soon enough.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Go on, try petting Shaggles. He's just as cuddly as he looks.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr... I can't come up with anything good. I'm just a little creature...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Shaggles is down in the dumps. Perhaps petting him would help cheer him up.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr! Wh-What are you doing!? I'm not a dog!

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Honestly, what the grrr was that?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Shaggles still seems melancholic. Perhaps petting him again will do the trick.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrrrrr...rrr... Heh. Hee hee...

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: You know, I actually feel a bit better now.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Seems like he's back to his old self. Listen, Shaggles. If anyone can do this, it's you!

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr... I'd normally call him a buffoon and move on, but I'm the grrr who nearly destroyed Labyrinthos's ecosystem by unleashing a superstrength pesticide. If anyone's a fool, it's me.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: I know I'm forbidden from consulting the researchers, but I can ask you for advice, right?

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: You must've fought your fair share of foes on your adventures. How do you take down the especially grrr ones?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I harness all my strength.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I focus on their weaknesses.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I simply...end them.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: But we can't use our strong pesticide. The fumes would grrr havoc...

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Wait, fumes... That's it─we need to suffocate the vilekin!

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: The woodworms do come from tropical climes, so their weakness would probably be freezing temperatures. Though if we make it too cold in the Archeion we'd risk exposing the books to frost damage when all the moistgrrr in the air freezes...

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Wait, the air... Deprive them of the air they need to survive!

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr! That's very morbid, thank you.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: I suppose the easiest way to “end” any creature is to stop it from breathing... Depriving them of the air they need to survive!

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: I bet we could starve the worms of oxygen with the gas emitted when you pour hydrochloric acid on limestone. We'll need to evacuate the staff and other living specimens, but it wouldn't damage the tomes or documents.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: We won't know if it'll work unless we grrr it a go. N'welhi Tia can get the acid, so I just need you to find some limestone.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: There's more than enough for the taking in the thirty-grrr facet. Meet us at the Archeion once you have it!

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: I get the impression you've come up with a solution. Would you mind filling me in?

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Brilliant! Though...I'd best at least pretend to be looking after Shaggles while I fetch that acid. Please do get that stone in the meantime.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Do you not find the thirty-third facet to be a bit...scary? I'm terrible with gloomy places like that.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Everyone's out and we've got the acid as promised. Did you keep your end of the bargain?

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Many grrrs! I'll be right back.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: I've filled the test room with gas. Now we only need wait and see what happens.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr...

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: You know, I've been on my own almost as long as I can remember. I do recall that I constantly questioned my parents, which is probably what led to them giving up on me altogether.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: That same intelligence─or belligerence, depending on who you grrr─saw me rescued and brought here. It made me interesting, I suppose. But I've only ever been treated as a specimen. You're the first person I've been able to have an actual conversation with.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: For the longest time, the Archeion's books were my only friends. They were both my loyal companions and my window from which I gazed upon the outer world.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: That's why I can't stand by and let them be destroyed.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Naturally, I would love for my intelligence to be recognized so that I might become a researchgrrr in my own right. But more than anything, I want to protect the Archeion.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: It worked! It actually worked! The pests are no more and the tomes look as good as new.

dialogue.name: VEANDELINET
dialogue.text: Well done─your method is both effective and safe. We shall waste no time in using it to rid the entire facility of woodworms.

dialogue.name: VEANDELINET
dialogue.text: As promised, you will no longer be treated as a mere specimen. From now on, you are an apprentice researcher.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Grrr! Thank heavens the Archeion will be safe once more.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: And allow me to thank you for everything. I couldn't have done it alone.

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: My very first project as an apprentice will be to study how to produce sounds just like your kind do. After grrr, if I want to be a researcher, I need to learn how to speak with people other than you.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: It's good to see Shaggles looking so pleased. Thank you for all you've done for us!

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Oh, but before you go, could you perhaps tell me what he thinks of me?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: He calls you a buffoon. Regularly.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: He's, er...rather disparaging.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Is that so...

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Ah, but he's too adorable to be angry with. Come, let me pet you!

dialogue.name: LITTLETROLL
dialogue.text: Cease this, you buffoon! I'm no one's pet.

dialogue.name: NWELHITIA
dialogue.text: Nooo, come back!
